ruleBookInfo.author: [property$=author]@content
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
[property$=chapter_name]@content
##\d+\.|（.*|\(.*|【.*|(零|一|二|三|四|五|六|七|八|九|十|百|千|万)(.|\s)*章|“|”
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3
ruleBookInfo.name: [property$=book_name]@content

ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##\s*({{ book.durChapterTitle }}|.*作者：.*|\(本章完\)|PS：.*求推荐！|PS：.*求收藏！|感谢.*打赏.*|感谢.*推荐票.*|感谢.*月票.*|（.*月票.*）|（为大家的.*票加更.*）|第二更在.*|loadAdv.*)\s*

ruleSearch.author: tag.label.0@text
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
if(result.match(/Just a moment/)){
cookie.removeCookie(source.bookSourceUrl)
var x=baseUrl;
var s=java.startBrowserAwait(x,"验证").body()
result=s;
	}else{
		result=result;
		}
result
</js>
class.newbox@ul@li
#article_list_content ul@li||#checkform@div.0@div.0@ul@li||class.newlistbox@ul@li
ruleSearch.name: h3@text
